title: Elements of surface hardening
creator_credit: F.E. Brooker, Audio Productions and United States. Office of Education
brief_description:
Episode number 3 of Series “Engineering heat treatment of steel”.
Shows how steel is pack and gas carburised; how a thin, hard case is obtained by cyaniding; how nitriding is used to obtain a very hard case; and how steel is flame and induction hardened.
